Question
========

Given are a quantitative outcome variable, and both a categorical and quantitative predictor. Which two analysis techniques can be used to examine a multiple-cause hypothesis? 
Answerlist
----------
* ANCOVA and linear regression with dummies.
* ANCOVA and logistic regression with dummies.
* Two-way ANOVA and linear regression with dummies.
* Two-way ANOVA and logistic regression with dummies.
